pageContext.claim: “The Radical left district attorney in Portland has released hundreds of rioters and announced that anyone arrested for interfering with police officers, disorderly can conduct even criminal trespass, rioting, and other offenses will not be prosecuted.”
pageContext.analysis: The president is giving Portland’s mayor too much credit. Multnomah County District Attorney Mike Schmidt dismissed charges against roughly half of the 600 people arrested during the summer’s racial justice protests. Schmidt has also said that he would decline to prosecute minor offenses against demonstrators.
